IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module rigid_body :: Class Joint

Class Joint

source code

A joint in a rigid body model, with its own rotating co-ordinate frame.

Instance Methods

Method Details

__init__(self, parent, name=None, offset=None)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct a joint.

Parameters:
  • parent - Parent Joint, or None for the root joint.
  • name - Name of this joint.
  • offset - Offset of this joint in the co-ordinate frame of its parent, as a 3x1 np.ndarray. Default is zero offset.
Overrides: object.__init__

getPoint(self, pointName)

source code 

Get a point by name from the point tree rooted at this point.

Parameters:
  • pointName - The name of the point to return (string).
Returns:
The corresponding Point object.
Raises:
  • KeyError - If the named point is not present in the subtree.

getJoint(self, jointName)

source code 

Get a joint by name from the subtree rooted at this joint.

Parameters:
  • jointName - The name of the joint to return (string).
Returns:
The corresponding Joint object.
Raises:
  • KeyError - If the named joint is not present in the subtree.
